medical_history.chief_complaint: RUQ abdominal pain with episodes of diarrhea and emesis.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient developed RUQ abdominal pain which was followed by multiple episodes of diarrhea and emesis. The pain continued to increase and was described as sharper than pain experienced during a previous episode of pancreatitis.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of open cholecystectomy, peripheral neuropathy, suspected cirrhosis diagnosed by biopsy, history of ascites (with previous paracentesis), hypothyroidism, gastroesophageal reflux disease, and depression.
medical_history.family_history: There is no family history of sudden cardiac death or early myocardial infarction (MI) or stroke.
